replies.author: ⊙u⊙
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 ⊙u⊙ 于 2019-8-27 23:40 编辑 

scoreboard players operation @a[tag=process] dice = @r[type=are_effect_cloud,tag=dice,c=1] dice
这样能使标签为process的玩家dice分数等同于dice标签的药水云dice分数。

但你并不需要operaton，随机到的实体标签为多少，就给多少分
summon armor_stand ~ ~ ~ {Tags:["dice","roll_1"]}
...
summon armor_stand ~ ~ ~ {Tags:["dice","roll_6"]}
execute @r[type=armor_stand,tag=dice,c=1] ~ ~ ~ scoreboard players tag @s add process
execute @e[type=armor_stand,tag=process] ~ ~ ~ execute @s[tag=roll_1] ~ ~ ~ scoreboard players set @a[tag=process,c=1] 1
...
execute @e[type=armor_stand,tag=process] ~ ~ ~ execute @s[tag=roll_6] ~ ~ ~ scoreboard players set @a[tag=process,c=1] 6
scoreboard players tag @e[type=armor_stand] remove process




修改了一下，毕竟每次都要用，就不清除实体了

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
你说的不是很清楚

我就提供一个思路。（而且还不好

你之前问的骰子，随机了一个记分板上的分数。然后你每走一步，记分板上扣一分，扣完后就给某个用于记录队伍回合的记分板的分数加 1 什么的。

然后再判断分数执行相应的命令就行了

replies.author: ⊙u⊙
replies.txt_content:
检测地底方块执行对应移动方向，例子

execute @e[tag=plane,scores_move_min=1] ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~-2 ~ wool 1 teleport @s ~ ~ ~2
execute @e[tag=plane,scores_move_min=1] ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~-2 ~ wool 2 teleport @s ~ ~ ~-2
execute @e[tag=plane,scores_move_min=1] ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~-2 ~ wool 3 teleport @s ~2 ~ ~
execute @e[tag=plane,scores_move_min=1] ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~-2 ~ wool 4 teleport @s ~-2 ~ ~复制代码
